                                 throws ClassNotFoundException

        抛出:
        ClassNotFoundException

                        String pk,

                                 throws ClassNotFoundException

      • getSimpleSurname

        public static String getSimpleSurname(Class<?> clazz)
        类似Class.getSimpleName()，但是可以忽略它是一个javassist生成的动态类

        Class.getSimpleName()

      • getSurname

        public static String getSurname(Class<?> clazz)

        另请参阅:
        Class.getName()

      • getFieldValue

                   Field field)

      • getFieldValue

        public static Object getFieldValue(Object object,
                   String fieldName)
        直接读取对象属性值,无视private/protected修饰符,不经过getter函数.

      • getSuperClassGenricType

        public static <T> Class<T> getSuperClassGenricType(Class clazz)
        通过反射,获得Class定义中声明的父类的泛型参数的类型.
        参数:
        clazz - The class to introspect
        返回:
        the first generic declaration, or Object.class if cannot be determined

      • getSuperClassGenricType

        public static Class getSuperClassGenricType(Class clazz,
                            int index)
        通过反射,获得定义Class时声明的父类的泛型参数的类型.
        参数:
        clazz - clazz The class to introspect
        index - the Index of the generic ddeclaration,start from 0.
        返回:
        the index generic declaration, or Object.class if cannot be determined

      • setFieldValue

        public static <T> void setFieldValue(T object,
                     Field field,
                     Object value)
        直接设置对象属性值,无视private/protected修饰符,不经过setter函数.

      • setFieldValue

                     String fieldName,

        直接设置对象属性值,无视private/protected修饰符,不经过setter函数.
